item.title: A Beautiful Gallery That Just Works
item.description: This video gallery was designed for people who are looking for a robust video solution that just works, without sacrificing looks or usability. With a solid AS3 code base, this file is fast, stable, and responsive. Try it out for yourself.

item.title: Custom Poster Frames & Thumbnails
item.description: The gallery supports custom poster frames and thumbnail images for each video presented. Don't want a poster frame? No problem. Simply leave the field blank in the XML file.

item.title: Simple to Edit
item.description: Most aspects of the video gallery, including video titles and descriptions, are easily controlled through a simple to edit XML file. You can also add inline anchor tags formatted with an external CSS file.

item.title: Keyboard Shortcuts, Autoplay, & So Much More
item.description: Enable or disable features like keyboard shortcuts, autoplay, fullscreen, and video smoothing with ease. Use the keyboard to navigate the gallery: Left & Right arrows switch between thumbnails. Enter loads the video. Space bar plays and pauses the selected video.

item.title: Room for Long Titles
item.description: Room for long descriptions (approximately 85 word-count).
